TITLE: ℹ Pagina De Ajuda Do ManageInvites
ADMIN_CONTENT:
> **{{prefix}}set-fake-threshold**: Considers very recent accounts as fake accounts (change the threshold)
> **{{prefix}}set-stacked-ranks**: Whether members keep all their roles or only the highest one
> **{{prefix}}setkeep-ranks**: Whether members keep their roles when they lose invitations
> **{{prefix}}blacklist [add/remove/list] (@user)**: Add/Remove a user to the blacklist
> **{{prefix}}addbonus number @user/all**: Add bonus invites to a member
> **{{prefix}}removebonus number @user/all**: Remove bonus invites to a member
> **{{prefix}}sync-invites**: Synchronize server invites and bot invites
> **{{prefix}}removeinvites**: Remove server invites
> **{{prefix}}restoreinvites**: Restore server invites
RANKS_CONTENT:
> **{{prefix}}addrank número @cargo**: Adicionar uma recompensa de rank
> **{{prefix}}removerank @cargo**: Remover uma recompensa de rank
> **{{prefix}}ranks**: Lista das recompensa de rank
JOIN_DM_CONTENT:
> **{{prefix}}configdm**: Configurar mensagens __**de entrada no privado**__
> **{{prefix}}setdm**: Desativar/Ativar mensagens __**de entrada no privado**__
> **{{prefix}}testdm**: Testa mensagens __**de entrada no privado**__
JOIN_CONTENT:
> **{{prefix}}configjoin**: Configurar mensagens de __**entrada**__
> **{{prefix}}setjoin**: Desativar/Ativar mensagens de __**entrada**__
> **{{prefix}}testjoin**: Testar mensagens de __**entrada**__
LEAVE_CONTENT:
> **{{prefix}}configleave**: Configurar mensagens de __**saída**__
> **{{prefix}}setleave**: Desativar/Ativar mensagens de __**saída**__
> **{{prefix}}testleave**: Testar mensagens de __**saída**__
INVITES_CONTENT:
> **{{prefix}}invite (@user)**: Give you the number of invitations you have or the member mentioned has.
> **{{prefix}}leaderboard**: Show the invites leaderboard of the server.
CORE_CONTENT:
> **{{prefix}}botinfos**: Mostra as informações sobre o ManegeInvite
> **{{prefix}}ping**: Mostra o ping do ManageInvite.
> **{{prefix}}support**: Entre no servidor de suporte.
> **{{prefix}}stats**: Exibir estatísticas do seu servidor.
> **{{prefix}}add**: Adiciona me no seu servidor.
TIP: Dica: você pode ver sua configuração com {{prefix}}config
